pr_title: [GEOS-9462] Downgrade ArcSDE plugin to an unsupported  module

timeline.message: [GEOS-9462] Downgrade ArcSDE plugin as an unsupported  module

timeline.bodyText: A plugin with sentiment! (that must be a first)
timeline.author: aaime
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,9 @@
 ArcSDE Plugin
 -------------
 
-The ArcSDE plugin allows the GeoTools developer to work with the `ArcSDE <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ArcSDE>`_ middle ware. The ArcSDE plugin has been with us since GeoTools 2.0 and is much loved.
+Unsupported plugin allowing to work with the `ArcSDE <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ArcSDE>`_ middle ware.
+The ArcSDE plugin has been with us since GeoTools 2.0 and is much loved, yet it has become unsupported

replies.bodyText: lol, didn't want to change the existing statement :)
replies.author: groldan

replies.bodyText: not sure, let me double check.
replies.author: groldan

replies.bodyText: ok, that's actually a fix. That profile is meant for development when you do have the proprietary jars in your local maven repo. Both common/pom.xml and datastore/pom.xml use it, but in common it was called arcsde and in datastore arcsde-jars.
replies.author: groldan
